_sText:
I was planning on making this map atlantis but i didn't get the water to work right so i made it a combine testing facility

the ct and terrorists are opposing prisoners who escape.

it didnt take long to make and its only a beta so i may add more stuff..

the gamplay is top notch and the ambience is really cool.

there are 2 bomb sites.
there are buyzones and guns in the map so either one u want.


ENJOY!! and dont forget to comment at will!
